description: This file contains a unit test class that verifies the behavior of Git commands with intercepts during a Yocto build process, specifically testing for issues related to user ownership and the disabling of pseudo during the process.

classes.name: GitCheck
classes.description: A test case class derived from OESelftestTestCase that includes methods to test Git intercept behavior.

methods.name: test_git_intercept(self)
methods.description: A test method that runs specific BitBake commands to verify Git intercept behavior regarding user ownership and pseudo disabling.
